at0000.1.description: A persistent and managed list of any combination of archetypes that will support the accurate recording of a Care plan.

otherDetails.licence: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/.

constraint: Consent to EoL Care plan and sharing information

includedExternalTerminologyCodes.value: The patient is an adult (18+) and has agreed to the creation of a personalised care plan and sharing of information as above
The patient is an adult (18+) but lacks mental capacity to make the above decisions. Consent has been given by a Lasting Power of Attorney for health and welfare
The patient is an adult (18+) but lacks mental capacity to make the above decisions. A clinical decision has been made in their best interest in consultation with the family/carers, if possible
The patient is aged 17 years or younger, and the person with parental responsibility has agreed to the creation of a personalised care plan and the sharing of information as above
The patient is aged 16 or 17 years and has given their own consent
The patient is aged 15 years or under, but was judged to have capacity to give their own consent
The patient is aged 17 years or younger. It has not been possible to obtain consent of a person with parental responsibility, but a clinical decision has been made in their best interest

at0005.1.text: Does the person have capacity to making and sharing this plan?

at0009.1.description: Narrative description of the individual's mental capacity.

at0000.1.description: The ability of an individual to use and understand information to make or consent to a decision, plan or intervention.

en.purpose: To record activity regarding the planning and carrying out of a single care plan as a whole.
en.use: Use to record activity regarding the planning and carrying out of a single care plan as a whole.
en.misuse: Not to be used to record activity of individual components of a care plan - use the specific ACTION archetype appropriate for each activity.
en.copyright: © Australian Digital Health Agency, openEHR Foundation

at0000.1.description: Plan or sequence of discrete activities developed to achieve a specified management goal or treatment outcome, carried out by health professionals and/or the patient.

en.use: Use to record activity regarding the planning and carrying out of a single care plan as a whole.
en.misuse: Not to be used to record activity of individual components of a care plan - use the specific ACTION archetype appropriate for each activity.
en.copyright: © Australian Digital Health Agency, openEHR Foundation

at0000.1.description: Plan or sequence of discrete activities developed to achieve a specified management goal or treatment outcome, carried out by health professionals and/or the patient.

nb.purpose: For å registrere detaljer rundt tidspunkt og sted for død.
nb.use:
Brukes for å registrere detaljer rundt tidspunkt og sted for død.

Denne arketypen er laget for å brukes i CLUSTER.person og EVALUATION.cause_of_death.

en.purpose: To record details related to the time and place of death.
en.use:
Use to record details related to the time and place of death.

This archetype has been designed to be used within the CLUSTER.person and also EVALUATION.cause_of_death.

otherDetails.ip_acknowledgements: This artefact includes content from SNOMED Clinical Terms® (SNOMED CT®) which is copyrighted material of the International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO). Where an implementation of this artefact makes use of SNOMED CT content, the implementer must have the appropriate SNOMED CT Affiliate license - for more information contact https://www.snomed.org/snomed-ct/get-snomed or info@snomed.org.

en.purpose: To record the place of death of an individual, primarily to ascertain if their advanced care precferences have been met.
en.misuse: Not suitable for use for forensic or other post-mortem diagnostic purposes.

at0000.1.description: The location at which the subject died and any variance from their preferred place of death.

at0002.1.description: The place at which the patient died.

at0000.1.description: A generic section header which should be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.
Un encabezado de sección de tipo genérico que será renombrado en una plantilla para su empleo en un contexto clínico específico.
En generisk seksjonsoverskrift som skal gis nytt navn i en templat for å passe i en gitt klinisk kontekst.
Um cabeçalho de sessão genérico que deve ser renomeado no template para adequar-se a um contexto clínico específico.
En allmän avsnittsrubrik som döps om i en openEHR-mall för att passa in i en specifik klinisk kontext.
Eine generische Abschnittsüberschrift eines Templates, welche entsprechend dem spezifischen klinischen Kontext umbenannt werden sollte.
Un'intestazione di sezione generica che dovrebbe essere rinominata in un template per adattarsi ad uno specifico contesto clinico.
Un en-tête de section générique qui doit être renommé dans un modèle pour s'adapter à un contexte clinique spécifique.
